ast_based.description: Rules that can be checked via SQL syntax tree analysis

rules.name: Avoid SELECT *
rules.description: Always specify columns explicitly to reduce data transfer and improve performance

rules.name: Use Schema Prefix
rules.description: Use schema prefix to specify the schema of the table explicitly

rules.name: Avoid Cross Joins
rules.description: Ensure join conditions are specific to avoid unintentional cross joins

rules.name: Avoid Functions in WHERE Clause
rules.description: Functions in WHERE clause prevent index usage

rules.name: Avoid OR in WHERE Clause
rules.description: Use UNION ALL instead of OR when possible for better index usage

rules.name: Minimize Use of DISTINCT
rules.description: Only use DISTINCT when necessary as it adds processing overhead

rules.name: Use EXISTS Instead of IN
rules.description: EXISTS is more efficient than IN for subqueries

rules.name: Avoid Cursors
rules.description: Use set-based operations instead of cursors

rules.name: Avoid Scalar Functions in SELECT
rules.description: Scalar functions in SELECT can be a performance bottleneck

rules.name: Avoid Large IN Lists
rules.description: Replace large IN lists with joins or temp tables

rules.name: Use UNION ALL vs UNION
rules.description: Use UNION ALL when duplicates are acceptable to avoid deduplication overhead

rules.name: Avoid Implicit Conversions
rules.description: Ensure data types match to avoid implicit conversions

rules.name: Use SET NOCOUNT ON
rules.description: Use in stored procedures to reduce network traffic

rules.name: Use SET XACT_ABORT ON
rules.description: Automatically rollback transactions on errors

rules.name: Use TRY...CATCH
rules.description: Handle errors gracefully in procedures and transactions

rules.name: Use Proper Joins
rules.description: Prefer INNER JOINs over OUTER JOINs when possible

rules.name: Temp Tables vs Table Variables
rules.description: Use temp tables for large datasets, table variables for small ones

rules.name: Dynamic SQL Caution
rules.description: Ensure dynamic SQL inputs are parameterized

rules.name: Keep Transactions Short
rules.description: Ensure transactions have proper COMMIT/ROLLBACK

rules.name: Optimize Subqueries
rules.description: Convert subqueries to JOINs or CTEs when possible

rules.name: Limit Result Set
rules.description: Use TOP or LIMIT to return only necessary rows

rules.name: Use usp Prefix
rules.description: Use 'usp_' prefix for user-defined stored procedures, not 'sp_'

execution_plan.description: Rules that require execution plan analysis

rules.name: Missing Indexes
rules.description: Detect missing index recommendations in execution plan

rules.name: Table Scans
rules.description: Identify table scan operations that read entire tables

rules.name: Index Scans vs Seeks
rules.description: Prefer index seeks over index scans

rules.name: Implicit Conversions in Plan
rules.description: Detect implicit conversions in execution plan

rules.name: Parallelism Issues
rules.description: Detect excessive parallelism operators

rules.name: Expensive Sort Operations
rules.description: Identify expensive sort operations

rules.name: Hash Operations
rules.description: Detect hash match operations

rules.name: Key Lookups
rules.description: Identify key/RID lookups indicating missing covering indexes

rules.name: Cardinality Estimation Issues
rules.description: Detect large discrepancies between estimated and actual rows

metadata.description: Rules that require querying database metadata

rules.name: Statistics Freshness
rules.description: Check if statistics are up to date

rules.name: Index Fragmentation
rules.description: Detect fragmented indexes that need rebuilding

rules.name: Missing Statistics
rules.description: Identify tables missing statistics

rules.name: Unused Indexes
rules.description: Detect indexes that are never used

rules.name: Duplicate Indexes
rules.description: Identify redundant or duplicate indexes

rules.name: Table Partitioning
rules.description: Check if large tables should be partitioned

rules.name: Columnstore Indexes
rules.description: Recommend columnstore indexes for data warehousing

rules.name: Data Type Appropriateness
rules.description: Check for oversized data types

rules.name: Heap Tables
rules.description: Identify tables without clustered indexes

rules.name: Wide Tables
rules.description: Detect tables with excessive columns

rules.name: Foreign Key Indexes
rules.description: Ensure foreign keys have supporting indexes

general.description: General best practices requiring human judgment

rules.name: Use Descriptive Names
rules.description: Choose meaningful names for objects

rules.name: Use Appropriate Data Types
rules.description: Select suitable data types for variables

rules.name: Avoid Reserved Keywords
rules.description: Don't use SQL Server reserved keywords for names

rules.name: Batch Updates and Deletes
rules.description: Batch large operations to reduce locking

rules.name: Optimize JOIN Order
rules.description: Place smallest result set first in joins

rules.name: Filter Early
rules.description: Apply filters as early as possible

rules.name: Review and Refactor Code
rules.description: Regularly review SQL code for optimization

rules.name: Continuous Learning
rules.description: Stay updated with SQL Server features
